MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY16 and SY21 postcode areas of Newtown and Welshpool. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7PM due to repairs required on the overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 9PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:20PM on Saturday 30th January 2021.
